narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Ies Arizona PLLC is a Emergency Medicine provider based in Tucson, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $12.6M in Medicaid payments across 135K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $12.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
